sn22.87:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.87:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vakkali kumbhakāranivesane viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.87:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.87:4.6: ‘vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
sn22.87:4.8: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.87:4.9: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.87:4.11: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.87:4.12: “vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati;
sn22.87:4.14: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.87:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā vakkali tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.87:5.2: Addasā kho āyasmā vakkali bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn22.87:5.3: Disvāna mañcake samadhosi.
sn22.87:5.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ etadavoca:
sn22.87:5.9: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ etadavoca:
sn22.87:5.10: “kacci te, vakkali, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn22.87:5.13: bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn22.87:5.15: “Kacci te, vakkali, na kiñci kukkuccaṃ, na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.87:5.16: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṃ kukkuccaṃ, anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.87:5.17: “Kacci pana taṃ, vakkali, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.87:5.18: “Na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.87:5.19: “No ce kira taṃ, vakkali, attā sīlato upavadati;
sn22.87:5.20: atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.87:5.21: “Cirapaṭikāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo, natthi ca me kāyasmiṃ tāvatikā balamattā, yāvatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyan”ti.
sn22.87:6.1: “Alaṃ, vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena?
sn22.87:6.2: Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati so maṃ passati;
sn22.87:6.3: yo maṃ passati so dhammaṃ passati.
sn22.87:7.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.87:7.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.87:7.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn22.87:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena gijjhakūṭo pabbato tena pakkāmi.
sn22.87:8.2: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali acirapakkantassa bhagavato upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:8.3: “etha maṃ, āvuso, mañcakaṃ āropetvā yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamatha.
sn22.87:8.4: Kathañhi nāma mādiso antaraghare kālaṃ kattabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti?
sn22.87:8.5: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
sn22.87:8.6: Atha kho bhagavā tañca rattiṃ tañca divāvasesaṃ gijjhakūṭe pabbate vihāsi.
sn22.87:8.7: Atha kho dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu … pe …
sn22.87:8.9: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.87:8.14: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu.
sn22.87:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.87:9.2: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatha;
sn22.87:10.1: ‘Suṇāvuso tvaṃ, vakkali, bhagavato vacanaṃ dvinnañca devatānaṃ.
sn22.87:10.2: Imaṃ, āvuso, rattiṃ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.87:10.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
sn22.87:10.7: so hi nūna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatīti.
sn22.87:10.8: Bhagavā ca taṃ, āvuso vakkali, evamāha—
sn22.87:10.11: Apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’”ti.
sn22.87:10.12: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā vakkali tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.87:11.1: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:11.3: Kathañhi nāma mādiso ucce āsane nisīditvā tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ sotabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti.
sn22.87:11.4: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ mañcakā oropesuṃ.
sn22.87:11.5: “Imaṃ, āvuso, rattiṃ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā … pe …
sn22.87:11.7: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.87:11.11: Bhagavā ca taṃ, āvuso vakkali, evamāha:
sn22.87:11.14: Apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’”ti.
sn22.87:11.15: “Tena hāvuso, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.87:11.22: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:11.26: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:11.31: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:11.35: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmī’”ti.
sn22.87:11.36: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā pakkamiṃsu.
sn22.87:11.37: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṃ āharesi.
sn22.87:12.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.87:12.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.87:12.10: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:12.17: Yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vāti na vicikicchāmī’”ti.
sn22.87:13.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn22.87:13.5: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.87:13.6: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ dūratova mañcake vivattakkhandhaṃ semānaṃ.
sn22.87:14.1: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uttaraṃ disaṃ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uddhaṃ disaṃ, gacchati adho disaṃ, gacchati anudisaṃ.
sn22.87:14.3: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ … pe …
sn22.87:14.6: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā vakkalissa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati:
sn22.87:14.8: Appatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena vakkali kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
